afk.done: You are now afk. If anyone mentions you, they will get a warning that you are afk. Your afk status will be removed if you chat in this server.
afk.doneGlobal: You are now afk. If anyone mentions you in any server we share, they will get a warning that you are afk. Your afk status will be removed if you chat in any server we share.
afk.title: AFK

global.title: Global AFK Removed
global.description: Your global afk has been removed due to a message from you.

server.title: AFK Removed
server.description: Your afk in this server has been removed due to a message from you.

auto.description: Manage automatic posting of certain images.

help.noInclude: Do not include the `<>` when running commands.
help.main: This command consists of several subcommands.

add.invalidType: Invalid type **{0}**. Use `{0}auto available` to see the valid types.
add.missingPermission: I'm missing the permission **{0}** in the channel <#{1}>.
add.done: Setup automatic posting of **{0}** in <#{1}>. Use `{2}auto remove {3}` to disable it.
add.nsfw: The type **{0}** is nsfw, and the channel <#{1}> is not nsfw.
add.max: You may only have **{0}** auto entries total. Contact a developer if you believe you need more than this, or remove some with `{1}auto remove`.

remove.invalidId: An entry was not found with the id **{0}**.
remove.lessThanOne: The entry id cannot be less than one.

list.noEntries: There aren't any auto entries to list.
list.lessThanOne: The page number cannot be less than one.
list.invalidPageOne: Invalid page number **{0}**, there is only one page.
list.invalidPage: Invalid page number **{0}**, there are **{1}** pages.

available.possible: These are the possible auto types.
available.incomplete: If the name is __underlined__, the type is incomplete.

clear.needPermission: You need the **manageGuild** permission to use this subcommand.
clear.noEntries: There are no entries to clear.
clear.confirm: Are you sure you want to remove **{0}** entries? **yes** or **no**.
clear.$: Do not translate yes or no

avatar.description: Get your avatar, or another person's avatar.
avatar.title: Avatar of {0}

booster.description: Claim perks for boosting our support server.
booster.notABooster: You are not a booster in our support server.
booster.alreadyActive: You are already marked as a booster.
booster.done: Congrats, your perks have been set up.

bugreport.description: Report a bug you found in the bot.
bugreport.missingTitle: Missing report title. Separate a title a description with a pipe (|).
bugreport.missingDescription: Missing report description. Separate a title a description with a pipe (|).
bugreport.done:
Your report was successfully posted.
You can view it and add more details here: {0}

help.description: List my commands, or get help with a command or category.
help.helpMe: Ha ha, very funny. Please specify either a command, category, or nothing.
help.neitherFound: Neither a command nor category was found with what you supplied.
help.slashTip:
TIP:
Commands with a **\*** beside them have a slash command variant. If your client supports them, and you invited me properly, you can type `/`, then the command and use it there. You can read more about it [here]({0}).
help.large: This is a large category, so command descriptions are not displayed.

leaderboard.noPages: there don't seem to be any leaderboard pages. It may not have been populated yet, please be patient.
leaderboard.serverTooLarge: this server is too large to display the leveling leaderboard.
leaderboard.invalidPage: the provided page number was invalid. Valid pages: {0}
leaderboard.pageLessThan: the page number cannot be less than one. Valid pages: {0}
leaderboard.pageMoreThan: there are not that many pages. Valid pages: {0}

embed.title: Server Leaderboard
embed.footer: Page {0}/{1} | Skipped {2} Non Cached Users | Generated In {3}ms
embed.hover:
Hover over the position and tag to show more info.
(you can also click to view it in your browser)
embed.global: you can add "--global" to see the global leaderboard.

suggest.description: Suggest something be added to the bot!
suggest.missingTitle: Missing suggestion title. Separate a title a description with a pipe (|).
suggest.missingDescription: Missing suggestion description. Separate a title a description with a pipe (|).
suggest.done:
Your suggestion was successfully posted.
You can view it here: {0}, and you can join our support server (<{1}>), and vote on it in <#800197845985525800>.

toggledmresponse.off: You will no longer get a response when you direct message me.
toggledmresponse.on: You will now revieve a response when you direct message me.

weirdedit.description: Make a message with a weird little edit thing.
weirdedit.missing1: First text missing. You must provide some text separated by commas.
weirdedit.missing2: Second text missing. You must provide some text separated by commas.
weirdedit.edited: This message will be edited soon.
